root.name: Melkor
root.description: A fantasy role playing game in development by Tigon Studios, featuring epic worlds and stealth action gameplay.The Tigon Studios website states that their aim for this game is to make a "hardcore and mature Zelda 64" (Referring to the Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time on the Nintendo 64). The website also says: "We don't try to explain the world... it just is." They say the game will feature a dark fantasy setting and will have a very powerful main character. The character will apparently use a mixture of stealth and magical abilities to complete tasks in the game.
